name: Classic Turkey Noodle Soup
description: This is a simple, comforting soup recipe to use up leftover holiday turkey. If you have a lot of turkey to use up, double, or even triple the recipe. Portion and freeze for an easy meal on a busy day.
preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot, bring 6 cups prepared broth to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium; stir 1 cup each chopped celery, carrots, cooked turkey, and about 1⁄2 cup broken spaghetti noodles. Partially cover and simmer for 10 min.
